title: I Want to Be Spiced Up
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hey, hey, Ai-senpai. Spice Kasumin up too, please~. Kasumin wants to try stuff like fake eyelashes and glitter too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm, a spiced up Kasukasu, huh…. Yeah, Ai can’t really imagine that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Why not!? Also, it’s not Kasukasu, it’s Kasumin! Don’t you think that Kasumin is worth the effort? Kasumin is like an unpolished stone, you know? Let’s make me shine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No, but aren’t you the cutest like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh….? Well, of course, Kasumin is always setting the record on the cutest thing every day, but….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Like~, the Kasumin right now…. has the cuteness to make Ai want to pat and hug you like woosh woosh woosh~~~, Ai can’t get enough of it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Certainly~! It’s exactly the kind of cuteness that makes people want to hug me, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, by the way, isn’t today the day that we all said we were going to watch Aqours’ live? Ai is sure Shiotti has prepared things so we can watch it on the audiovisual room’s big screen!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, that’s right! We have to study our rival after all! We need to bring a pen and a notebook<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Said the one that would only be holding a penlight during the live~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
